content: this is a hat with a double life it can be worn as a snug cowl or you can gather the drawstrings threaded through the top edge to turn it into a hat it is knitted sideways in a reverse stocking stitch rib which spirals round the hat and gives it extra stretch the hat fits an adult but tips on adapting the pattern for other sizes are included all my ravelry patterns are free to download but if you enjoy them please consider making a donation to the british liver trust where the money will go to fund research and support the families of children with a liver disease you can do this easily by going to my fundraising page here 1 happy knitting 1 https //www justgiving com/page/frankie-brown
